name: In search of love | Brackeys Jam
name_original: In search of love | Brackeys Jam
description:
Brackeys Jam
  • Theme: "Love is Blind".
  • Time: 1 Week.
Content of the Game
  • Fake 3D (is all 2D).
  • 4 different enemies.
  • Random Enviorement Generator.
  • Infinite fun.
  • And lots of Love!
Credits

This time I worked with my girlfriend.

I have done all the programming and game development.

And she has done all the incredible and beautiful art.

Song downloaded without copyright and a little edited for our interest.
